education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Bachelor of Business Administration, Finance
details: Completed coursework in Machine Learning, Software Engineering, Database Management, Computer Architecture, Object-Oriented Programming, Artificial Intelligence, and Statistical Computing.
Achieved Dean's List recognition, Intermediate iOS Development Certification (CodePath), AWS Cloud Practitioner Course, and Web Development Bootcamp certification.

description: Collaborated with senior engineers to develop a full-stack internal microservice for managing payments data using Go, Vue.js, and MySQL.
Automated data management processes by implementing PHP scripts, enhancing operational efficiency.
Demonstrated proficiency in Agile workflow, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS development practices, Jenkins CI/CD processes, and testing procedures for efficient software delivery.
Executed data migrations and one-offs, fixing over 200 test cases for MySQL version update.
Collaborated with PhD candidates and professors to design the ConvoSense dataset, improving common sense understanding in natural language processing.

Built a Conversational AI model based on Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) framework, effectively integrating information from over 12K university websites and 50+ departments into a centralized platform.
Constructing a submission to the 2024 NAACL Conference on an LLM-based dynamic information extraction technique designed to enhance the personability of Conversational Agent interactions.
Reduced data collection costs by over 80% by building LLM-powered data generation pipelines for synthetic dialogue generation.

projects.name: Eagle Rating [Group Project]
description: Led a team of 5 in developing a full-stack web application platform for Emory students to rate campus locations using Java Spring Boot and React.
Implemented search by tags and filtering functions, enabling efficient data querying from MongoDB database.
Utilized Docker for containerization, ensuring consistent operation across environments and simplifying deployment processes.

projects.name: DQN Stock Trading Project [Independent]
description: Leveraged Python, TensorFlow, and Keras to create a Deep Q-Network (DQN) for automated stock trading.
Engineered a multi-stock trading environment with state representation, action space, and reward computation.
Utilized scikit-learn for data preprocessing and designed a custom neural network using Keras.

projects.name: BlogSmart [Group Project]
description: Directed a team of 4 in designing an iOS platform for composing AI-assisted blogs, research papers, and editorials using OpenAI's GPT-3.5.
Introduced an AI-driven peer review system for enhanced content quality and originality.
Implemented CRUD functions using Parse Back4app DB to store user blogs.

other.title: Skills
content: Languages: Python, Java, SQL, PHP, Go, JavaScript, CSS, R.
Technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins CI/CD, Jira, Node.js, React.js, MongoDB, AWS, Vue.js, Git.
